privateSale.title: Important Information about the Sovryn {{token}} Bootstrap Event

information.1: You have been whitelisted for the Blockchain Whispers' Private {{token}} pre-sale! Welcome and thanks for your support!
information.2: It is highly recommended to send funds from an address directly owned by you (EOA).
information.3: For any questions, please ask the community in Discord or Telegram channels
information.4: The price of 100 {{token}} tokens is 1 SOV
information.5: {{token}} tokens purchased as part of this private pre-sale, will vest linearly for approximately 10 months from the time they are claimed.
information.7: Once you complete the purchase of the {{token}} Token it will be visible on the Portfolio Section.
information.8: There will be no vesting schedule for the purchased Token. So you can transfer Tokens once the sale ends.

privateSale.checkboxText: I have read and understand that I am responsible for my own Sovrynity

publicSale.title: Important Information about the {{token}} Bootstrap Event

information.1: Welcome to the {{token}} Bootstrap Event. Thank you for your participation!
information.2: We advise you to participate in this sale with a wallet solely and directly owned by you (EOA).
information.3: For any questions, please ask the community in our <0>Discord</0> or <1>Telegram</1> channels.
information.4: The price of 100 {{token}} is 1 SOV. Other assets will be converted to SOV at the current exchange rate prior to the purchase.
information.5: There will be no vesting schedule for the purchased token. You can transfer purchased {{token}} once the sale is concluded.
information.7: Once you receive the purchased {{token}} it will be visible in your <0>Portfolio</0> section.

1.title: You Are Connected!
1.p1: In order to borrow/lend and trade on Sovryn, you must first enable your Bitcoin by transferring them to your rsk wallet.
1.p2: You do this by creating a unique btc address that pegs to your RSK address, supercharging your BTC into RBTC.

2.p1: Your unique BTC address has been created, transfer BTC to receive RBTC in your RSK wallet.
2.important1: Do not deposit any non - BTC assets to this address, otherwise your assets will be lost permanently
2.important2: Please allow upto 15 mins for the transaction to process
2.contactUs: For support please join us on

meta.title: Welcome to Sovryn
meta.description: The Decentralized Bitcoin Trading And Lending Platform

landingPage.welcomeMessage: The decentralized bitcoin trading and lending platform

arbitrageOpportunity.title: Arbitrage opportunity
arbitrageOpportunity.noArbitrage: There are currently no arbitrage opportunities…

cryptocurrencyPrices.title: CRYPTOCURRENCY PRICES BY 24H CHANGE
cryptocurrencyPrices.marketCapTooltip:
Market cap is calculated as circulating supply * current USD price.

For SOV, circulating supply = total supply (100m) - tokens in vesting contracts, <0>not including tokens in adoption and development fund contracts.

For rBTC, circulating supply = BTC locked in the RSK 2 Way Peg

For all other tokens, circulating supply = total supply

For tokens that have come across a bridge from another chain, the circulating supply is the supply of that token on the RSK chain. For example, the circulating supply of ETHs is not equal to the circulating supply of ETH on ethereum.
cryptocurrencyPrices.circulatingSupplyTooltip:
We have updated the circulation supply formula to be showing the amount of liquid SOV token in line with market standards. SOV that has been unlocked from the adoption and development funds is now counted as circulating, and SOV that has been staked (either through vesting or voluntary staking) is not counted as circulating.

There is no change to your funds with this change. Just a standardisation of the displayed Circulating Supply.

p1.title: April  50k SOV BTC/USDT Pool Loot Drop
p1.text: Become a revered and respected Sovryn Liquidity Provider by adding your crypto to the pool. The longer you keep funds in the pool the more SOV you will earn.

p2.title: April  75k SOV BTC/SOV Pool Loot Drop
p2.text: The SOV/BTC liquidity pool is open, giving you the chance to take part in our biggest Liquidity Provision giveaway yet.

p3.title: 30K SOV SOV/RBTC Pool Loot Drop!
p3.text: Take your share of 30K SOV rewards by providing liquidity to the SOV/RBTC pool. Additional rolling weekly rewards will be announced shortly.

p4.title: 35K SOV ETHs/RBTC Pool Loot Drop
p4.text: In the first week, $1.2 million worth of SOV will be distributed to liquidity providers of the AMM. This super loot drop will last 7 days. Some quick maths indicate that early pool entrants will get somewhere in the region of 3000%!! The largest yield on ETH today. There will be further rewards for subsequent weeks which will be revised and announced towards the end of each week.

mining.title: Liquidity Mining
mining.text: Sovryn waves goodbye to centralised services that conventionally provide market-making. Fees generated by trading are distributed amongst liquidity providers as a reward, in exchange for facilitating trades and swaps.

marginTrading.title: Margin Trading
marginTrading.text: Margin trading allows you to use assets in your wallet as collateral for your margin, to borrow more assets or to increase your initial position.

swap.title: Swap
swap.text: Swap Frictionlessly between listed tokens. The Sovryn Decentralized AMM ensures no one can take advantage of you creating a trade

liquidity.title: Market Making
liquidity.text: Sovryn’s layer 2 solution operating on the Rootstock (RSK) Bitcoin side-chain facilitates the frictionless usage of financial primitives for multiple assets across multiple chains to further Satoshi’s vision of monetary sovereignty beyond simple peer to peer transactions

lending.title: Lending
lending.text: Earn a passive income by lending your assets directly to borrowers or to margin traders and decrease your exposure to wider market performances and fluctuations. Sovryn’s non-custodial solution keeps you in control of your funds, and you are free to withdraw your assets at any time.

stake.title: Stake & Vote
stake.text: The Sovryn protocol has hard-coded incentives for long-term growth. Token holders who stake their SOV receive a pro-rata share of the revenue that the platform generates from various transaction fees when they participate in the governance of the protocol by voting.

claimOriginBanner.text: Your SOV is ready to claim!

description.title: Uniswap Liquidity Pool Escrow
description.line1: Escrow pool participants will receive a 5% reward, plus a pro rata share from any trading fees generated in the SOV/ETH pool after any Impermanent Loss is covered by Sovryn, returning a minimum of 60% APY.
description.line2: 100% of SOV held in trust by Sovryn on behalf of users in the Uniswap escrow liquidity pool will be returned to users wallets 30 days after launch of the pool.
description.line3: The 5% reward plus the pro rata fee share will be credited to user wallets in SOV, 30 days after launch of the pool.
